rows.label: qst300403_msg001
rows.name: Task 2

rows.label: qst300403_msg002
rows.name: After accepting task 2

rows.label: qst300403_msg003
rows.name: Task 8 report

rows.label: qst300403_msg0001
rows.name: I have been waiting for you.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0002
rows.name:
It may not be necessary to
introduce myself to you, but
as a matter of courtesy...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300403_msg0003
rows.name:
I am Lagert, the current
Queen of the Kingdom of
Invidia. [ML:Dash ]I have startled you.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0004
rows.name:
As the head of a nation, I cannot
move openly...[ML:Dash ] I apologize for
making the request in this manner.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0005
rows.name:
Thank you. The exploits
of the Hræsvelgr Merc Group
have reached my ears.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0006
rows.name:
I have made this request,
counting on your proven skills
and your freedom to move.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0007
rows.name:
In Invidia, there are six noble
families that founded the nation...[ML:Dash ]
they are called the Six Great Nobles.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0008
rows.name: My own house, Selosia, is one of them.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0009
rows.name:
Each house has passed down a Jeweled
Signet ring for generations...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300403_msg0010
rows.name:
When the six Jeweled Signets are
combined, they form a single seal,
which is our nation's seal, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300403_msg0011
rows.name:
I have been informed that one
of them has been stolen and
its whereabouts are unknown.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0012
rows.name:
The one who stole the Jeweled Signet
is a Gulan mercenary named Garlo.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0013
rows.name:
I would like you to retrieve the
Jeweled Signet from that person.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0014
rows.name: You will accept? I am grateful.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0015
rows.name:
In these unstable times, making
this matter public and mobilizing
troops is not a wise move.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0016
rows.name:
The loss of the Jeweled
Signet could become a spark
that leads to chaos...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300403_msg0017
rows.name: I await good news.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0101
rows.name: Thank you. Your work was as expected.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0102
rows.name:
I have also been investigating
behind the scenes.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0103
rows.name:
It seems it was a plot by a
Superbian official, taking
advantage of the succession war.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0104
rows.name: Rest assured.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0105
rows.name:
The main culprit was
apprehended by your allies
after escaping the empire.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0106
rows.name:
The Jeweled Signet has
also been returned. This
matter is now resolved.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0107
rows.name:
The reward will be sent to the
Hræsvelgr Merc Group as a whole.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0108
rows.name:
You have truly been a great
help. I am grateful.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0109
rows.name:
I look forward to your
continued good work.
